SELECT u.user_id, u.realname, '党小组会' AS label FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT u.user_id FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN tab_pb_participant p ON p.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN tab_pb_activities a ON a.activities_id = p.activities_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0' AND u.ebl_flag = '1' AND p.del_flag = '0' AND p.ebl_flag = '1' AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.ebl_flag = '1' -- 党小组
AND FIND_IN_SET( 59057, a.activities_type_ids ) AND YEAR ( a.start_time ) = YEAR ( now( ) ) AND MONTH ( a.start_time ) = MONTH ( now( ) ) ) AND u.del_flag = '0' AND u.ebl_flag = '1' UNION SELECT u.user_id, u.realname, '支部委员会' AS label FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT u.user_id FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN tab_pb_participant p ON p.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN tab_pb_activities a ON a.activities_id = p.activities_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0' AND u.ebl_flag = '1' AND p.del_flag = '0' AND p.ebl_flag = '1' AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.ebl_flag = '1' -- 支部委员会
AND FIND_IN_SET( 59056, a.activities_type_ids ) AND YEAR ( a.start_time ) = YEAR ( now( ) ) AND MONTH ( a.start_time ) = MONTH ( now( ) ) ) AND u.del_flag = '0' AND u.ebl_flag = '1' UNION SELECT u.user_id, u.realname, '主题党日' AS label FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT u.user_id FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN tab_pb_participant p ON p.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN tab_pb_activities a ON a.activities_id = p.activities_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0' AND u.ebl_flag = '1' AND p.del_flag = '0' AND p.ebl_flag = '1' AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.ebl_flag = '1' -- 主题党日
AND FIND_IN_SET( 59060, a.activities_type_ids ) AND YEAR ( a.start_time ) = YEAR ( now( ) ) AND MONTH ( a.start_time ) = MONTH ( now( ) ) ) AND u.del_flag = '0' AND u.ebl_flag = '1'

SELECT u.user_id, u.realname, '党课' AS label FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT u.user_id FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN tab_pb_participant p ON p.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN tab_pb_activities a ON a.activities_id = p.activities_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0' AND u.ebl_flag = '1' AND p.del_flag = '0' AND p.ebl_flag = '1' AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.ebl_flag = '1' -- 党课
